scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace=eclipseproof-cli && npm install --workspace=eclipseproof-contract && npm install --workspace=frontend-vite-react
scripts.build:contract: cd eclipseproof-contract && compact compile src/eclipseproof.compact dist && mkdir -p src/managed/eclipseproof && cp -r dist/* src/managed/eclipseproof/
scripts.dev:backend: npm run build:contract && cd eclipseproof-cli && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend:simple: npm run build:contract && cd eclipseproof-cli && npm run dev:simple
scripts.start-app: npm run build:contract && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start-app:simple: npm run build:contract && concurrently "npm run dev:backend:simple" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start-app-testnet: npm run build:contract && concurrently "npm run dev:proof-server" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm run install:workspaces && npm run build
